description:
相手の攻撃を受け流す小型の盾。回避率が上昇する。
【回避 +5%】
name: バックラー

description:
魔法に対する抵抗力を付与した盾。
【回避 +5%】
name: マジックシールド

description: 革製のおしゃれな帽子。敏捷性が上昇する。
name: レザーキャップ

description: 攻撃力を高める魔法がかかった騎士のための頭飾り。
name: ナイトクレスト

description: 魔法力を高める加護がかかった頭飾り。魔法使いに人気。
name: サークレット

description: 動きやすさを重視した旅人御用達の衣服。
name: 旅人の服

description:
壮麗な装飾の施された騎士のための鎧。
【狙われ率150%】
name: キャリバーメイル

description: 真紅に彩られた宮廷魔導士のための魔法衣。
name: クリムゾンマント

description: 攻撃力を上昇する魔法の腕輪。戦士たちが愛用する。
name: 戦士の腕輪

description: 防御力を高める首飾り。後衛職が好んで身に着ける。
name: 守りの首飾り

description: 魔法力を高める指輪。魔法使いが好んで身に着ける。
name: 魔法の指輪

description: 魔法防御を高める装飾。聖教会の印が刻まれる。
name: 聖印のブローチ

description: 癒しの祝福を宿したリボン。ＨＰが徐々に回復する。
name: 癒しのリボン

description:
移動力を高める魔法の布。戦場を駆けまわれる。
【移動力 +1】
name: 疾風のバンダナ

description:
普通なら通れない場所が通れるようになる魔法の靴。
【水上・穴　通行可能】【ダメージ床無効】
name: ウイングブーツ

description: If unit's Spd > foe's Spd, grants Special cooldown charge +1 and deals +5 damage per unit's attack.
name: Demon Dance EX

description: If unit's HP ≤ 75%, Special cooldown count-1 at start of turn if Special triggers by attacking. If Special triggers, +10 damage from Special.
name: Avenger

description: Boosts damage dealt by 40% of unit's Spd. CD: 3. [Exclusive]
name: Avenger Tempest

description: Deals 100% Ability Power to the first grounded enemy in a line. Applies on-hit effects. Effective against Armored units. [Exclusive]
name: Power Wave

description: When initiating combat, gain Atk+6.
name: Strength Engage

description: Grants the target ally their turn back. In addition, restores their HP to the value at the start of their previous turn or heals them by 10, whichever is greater.[Exclusive]
name: Rewind

description: Grants Atk/Spd/Def/Res+3. Unit takes 6 damage after combat.
name: Madness Enhancement

description: If unit initiates combat with HP ≤ 75%, follow-up attacks occur immediately after unit's attack.
name: Desperation

description: Treats foe's Def/Res as if ignored by 30% during combat.|| CD: 2
name: Moon Breaker

description: For 2 turns, Monshiro gains a moonlight mirage that strikes with her, echoing 50% of the damage dealt. When foe initiates combat or uses an Active that would hit Monshiro, their first attack/Active will fail to connect. [Exclusive]
name: Lunar Haze

description: At start of turn, all magic foes in cardinal directions with AP < unit's AP suffer Atk-5 until the end of foe's next action.[Magic Users Only]
name: Ability Dominance

description: Grants bonus to Atk/Spd/Def/Res = current stat buff on each of unit's stats. Calculates each stat bonus independently.
name: Double Up

description: Neutralizes effects that guarantee foe's follow-up attacks and effects that prevent unit's follow-up attacks during combat.
name: Steady Stream

description: Deals 125% Ability Power in an explosion in front of the user. Effective against Armored and Flying units. [Exclusive]
name: Power Geyser

description: Treats foe's Def/Res as if ignored by 50% during combat.|| CD: 3
name: Sun Breaker

description: If attacked, unit granted Def/Res+4 during combat; also gains Special cooldown charge +1. [Exclusive]
name: Bloody Stream EX

description: User is immune to the effects of enemy Specials. At the start of any combat with the user, foe is inflicted with Special Cooldown + 1 and Special Cooldown Charge - 1. [Exclusive]
name: Bloody Teller

description: Boosts damage dealt by 30% of unit's Def and Spd. CD: 4. [Exclusive]
name: Countess Flash

description: Deals 100% Ability Power to the first grounded enemy in a line. Effective against Armored units. [Exclusive]
name: Power Wave

description: If attacked, unit granted Def+4 during combat; also gains Special cooldown charge +1.
name: Bloody Stream

description: Reduces incoming damage by 50%. CD: 4
name: All Shield

description: For 1 turn, Severa receives damage in place of the target ally. Damage received is reduced by difference between Severa's Defensive stat and ally's.[Exclusive]
name: Omnipotent Shield

description: If user has at least 3 more HP than foe at start of combat, grants user Def+6 during combat.
name: Healthy Defense

description: If unit's HP is ≥ 75% at start of combat, enemy is inflicted with Special cooldown charge-1.
name: Anti-Special

description: Grants user an HP Shield equal to 30 damage, lasting up to 2 turns.[Armor Only]
name: Self Shield

description: Treat foes Def/Res as if reduced by 50%, and heal for 50% of the damage dealt. Only activates in Sword Stance. Gallahad will then switch to Shield Stance. || CD: 5 [Exclusive]
name: Knight of Treachery

description: If unit is attacked by foe at ranged distance, unit receives Def/Res+6 during combat.
name: Distant Defense

description: At start of combat, if unit's HP ≥ 50%, grants Special cooldown charge +1 to unit and inflicts Special cooldown charge -1 on foe per attack. [Armor Only]
name: Special Armor

description: Boosts damage dealt by 80% of unit's Def. || CD: 4
name: Shield Assault

description: Swap HP with adjacent ally (neither unit can go above their max HP).
name: Solidarity

description: Grants Atk/Def+4 during combat if unit initiates the attack.
name: Vanguard Engage

description: For 1 turn, disable the Stance, Technique, and Aura skills of the target.[Exclusive]
name: Rondo Binding

description: Unit can counter-attack from any range. [Melee only]
name: Distant Counter

description: Restore 10 HP at the start of each turn. [Exclusive]
name: Knight's Resolve

description: Boosts Atk by 30%. || CD: 3
name: Burst Attack

description: Increase ally Def by +6.
name: Bolster Defense

description: Grants Def+6 during combat if unit initiates the attack.
name: Armored Engage

description: If unit is attacked and foe's HP < 100%, reduce Special Cooldown by 1 and unit can counter-attack first. [Exclusive]
name: Killer Instinct

description: Resolve combat as if foe suffered Def/Res-80%. || CD: 3 [Exclusive]
name: Kazikli Bey

description: Unit can counter-attack at any range. [Ranged Only]
name: Close Counter

description: Unit counterattacks first when attacked at HP ≤ 75%.
name: Critical Instinct

description: Grant an ally +6 Res for one turn.
name: Bolster Resistance

description: At start of combat, if unit's HP <= 80%, grants Atk+9 and Spd+10 during combat.
name: Critical Atk/Spd EX

description: During combat, if foe would reduce unit's HP to 0, unit survives with 1 HP. This Special's CD is reduced by 1 at the start of each turn where the user's HP is 50% or below. Cannot be negated. CD: 5 [Exclusive]
name: Determination

description: When initiating combat, gain Spd+6.
name: Speed Engage

description: If unit initiates combat, push the foe back one space and reduce their movement by 2 for a turn.[Exclusive]
name: Chain Crack

description: Increase ally Def/Res by 4.
name: Boost Def/Res

description: Deal 150% AP damage. Strikes the enemy with a chain, dragging them as close to the user as possible. [Exclusive]
name: Chain Warden

description: At start of combat, if foe's HP < 100% or if negative Status Effect is active on foe, inflicts Spd/Def/Res-5 on foe, and if unit initiates combat, unit can make a follow-up attack before foe can counterattack. [Exclusive]
name: Absolute Lust of Breaking

description: Grants Atk/Spd/Def/Res+4. Unit takes 8 damage after combat.
name: Madness Enhancement EX

description: Increase ally Atk by +6.
name: Bolster Attack

description: Treats foe's Def/Res as if ignored by 20% during combat. Boosts damage by 20% of unit's Spd. CD: 2 [Exclusive]
name: Imagine Breaker

description: Restores HP = 10 + (50% user's AP). Minimum of 15.
name: Recover

description: If user has at least 3 more HP than foe at start of combat, inflicts foe Atk/Spd/Def/Res-7 during combat. [Exclusive]
name: Malpractice

description: When healing allies with an Assist, unit also recovers the same amount.
name: Reciprocal Healing

description: Execute a foe with 35% or less HP if they are afflicted with a negative Status Effect. Fails if not used from behind the foe or if foe is King class.[EXCLUSIVE]
name: Mercy Kill

description: During combat, user copies all positive stat increases on foe. [Exclusive]
name: Perfect Chemistry

description: At start of turn, if unit is within 2 spaces of a foe, grants Atk/Spd/Def/Res+4 for 1 turn and inflicts Atk/Spd/Def/Res-4 on foes within 2 spaces through their next actions. [Exclusive]
name: Perfect World

description: Creates a large explosive barrier around the user. Deals 100% Def as magic damage to all enemies.[Exclusive]
name: Perfect Dark

description: If user starts turn in the same position as last turn, gain +10 AP/Res for 1 turn and 50 Mana.[Magic Users only]
name: Spellcaster's Thoughts

description: If foe initiates combat, grants Spd+9 during combat.
name: Speed Stance EX

description: When initiating combat, foe cannot counter-attack. After combat, foe cannot make follow-up attacks until the end of their next turn. [Exclusive]
name: Dumb Charm

description: Grants Atk/Spd+5. Inflicts Def/Res-5.
name: Glass Cannon

description: Boosts damage dealt by 50%. || CD: 3
name: Spike

description: If unit initiates combat, grants Atk +8 during combat.
name: Strength Engage EX

description: In combat against a Rook class foe, unit makes a follow-up attack and foe cannot.[Pawn Only]
name: Rook Breaker

description: User swaps position with target User gains an HP barrier equal equal to their Spd and can move again if used on new ally. Until the end of the turn, reduce damage taken by difference in Spd between user and foe. [Exclusive]
name: Precognition

description: User gains +2 Movement range and can bypass ZoCs for 1 turn. [Exclusive]
name: Pirate Scout
